gym_kusa_040_receptionist_01:
Are you ready to challenge Gym Leader Brassius,
the Verdant Virtuoso?
gym_kusa_040_receptionist_02:
Very well. Allow me to show you to the
battle court.
gym_kusa_040_receptionist_03:
Of course. Please feel free to come speak to me
whenever you’re ready.
gym_kusa_040_kusa_01: You did well to come this far![npcn:2C]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_15:
I am Brassius—an artist specializing in Grass-type
Pokémon. I am also the Gym Leader here at the\r
Artazon Gym.[npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_02:
I was observing your Gym Test from atop the
windmill, you know.[npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_03:
The perception you displayed in finding Sunflora
was truly... Oh, how shall I describe it?[npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_05:
I only pray that you might demonstrate that eye
for beauty in our battle as well.[npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_06:
Enough talk! We must begin creating our
collaborative work of art![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_07:
I trust that you are ready? It is time for our
masterpiece to take shape![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_08: Oh! What artistic tactics you employ![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_09:
The patterns of your moves! The minute details
of your Pokémon’s performance! Everything you\r
did was honed to perfection![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_10:
Our battle was, in a word, art! Indeed, if we
could not call that a work of artistry, then nothing\r
else in this world could be labeled as such![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_11:
If I were to judge your work, I would say it passes
my inspection. Yes—a pass without exception![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_12:
As proof of your artistic prowess, you may have
my Gym Badge! Shall we take a photo as well?[npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_badge:
If you possess [num1:1] Gym Badge[s:n1], it will be easier
to catch Pokémon of up to Lv. [num2:2], and those\r
Pokémon should follow your commands as well![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_badge_all:
If you possess 8 Gym Badges, you will be able
to catch Pokémon of any level. And they will\r
most certainly obey your every command as well![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_waza:
To a fantastic Trainer such as yourself, I would
also like to offer this—a favorite of mine![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_13:
Ah! My inspiration is overflowing, as if drawn
from a bottomless well![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_kusa_14:
I will begin on a new piece at once! You must
excuse me. Farewell![npcn:17]
gym_kusa_040_receptionist_04:
Congratulations! You’re now certified by the
Artazon Gym!
